snippet: The prized Southern Methodist recruit Emmanuel Mudiay will pursue professional basketball opportunities overseas instead of playing for the Mustangs.
abstract: Emmanuel Mudiay, prized Southern Methodist basketball recruit, is pursuing a professional basketball opportunities overseas instead of playing for the Mustangs; other college basketball news noted.
lead_paragraph: The prized Southern Methodist recruit Emmanuel Mudiay will pursue professional basketball opportunities overseas instead of playing for the Mustangs.
